content:
In this PR I'm adding results with a sufficient condition (non-zero-divisors are units) for subrings of local rings to be local.

#21168

@Kim Morrison Thanks for the comments, you suggested to move the results to a separate new file Subring.lean but the file already exists and contains quite unrelated material (local subrings of a given ring and some localization results). What I can suggest is to rename RingTheory/LocalRing/Subring.lean to RingTheory/LocalRing/LocalSubring.lean and create new file Subring.lean. Maybe @Andrew Yang could say something here?
